connect20/octopushsms.name: connect20/OctopushSms

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/octopushsms.description: Octopush provides innovative communication SMS APIs that enable applications and enterprises to easily connect to their customers and a WEB-BASED solution that allows business owners and marketers to run their own sms marketing campaigns in 190 countries.

connect20/octopushsms.name: connect20/OctopushSms

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/octopushsms.description: Octopush SMS allows you to send SMS push notification for specific events: - new account - new order - delievery notification - returned order - out of order notification .... This extension is free. For more information: www.octopush.com
